We will be back, but door locks need replacing.
It was great! Enjoyed the houseboat very much! The rooftop is great for entertaining a small group!
Great Experience. Fun area with a variety of things to do. The place is adorable, and we were very comfortable!
Great idea for air bnb please build a neighborhood in Richmond Va

Great experience. Erin was very helpful and covered everything we needed (be sure to open links in her email communication to assist with check in). We Loved our stay with Erin, the houseboat was exactly as described, it was peaceful and relaxing and within a 5-10 min walk from local bars and restaurants! We nice area as well! The parking was about a 2 mins walk to unit!

What a beautiful place to stay!!! Check in was super easy, location is perfect, everything was spotless!!
Highly recommend!!
Beautiful place on the water! Houseboat experince was awesome. Nothing but good things to say!

It‚Äôs a beautiful villa!

Our stay was amazing. We will definitely book again! The photos don't do it justice, simply lovely
Unbelievable

This is a beautiful and unique place! It is even more gorgeous than the pictures. The location is awesome and within walking distance to so many excellent restaurants!! The guide book that Marcia provides also has some great recommendations. We will be back!
Great location for a quick getaway!

Beautiful house boat!
I loved this place! Such a cool environment!
Wonderful getaway! Such a cute place and experience! Everything we hoped our weekend getaway would be!
We had a fantastic stay here! We enjoyed being right in the middle of the marina and super close to all the shops and restaurants. We will definitely be back! Thank you!

Staying at The Cove on the Cape Fear River was a unique and worthwhile experience.

I loved the location and I loved the Airbnb. The room was great and super comfortable, felt right at home!

great place! friendly owner!

Really enjoyed this place. The location was great for being able to explore Wilmington. Really enjoyed the view from the porch.

The location was perfect and we were able to walk almost everywhere, with the exception of the beaches. The Host was extremely helpful and made the stay seamless.
We had a great stay at Warren's place in Wilmington. Communication was great and made the contactless check-in and out very easy. The apartment was comfortable and had everything we needed.
We enjoyed our weekend in Wilmington. This was a great central location to all the things to do downtown.
